XML Format: ImplementationGuide-ig-uv-ips

Raw xml 


<ImplementationGuide xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="ig-uv-ips"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>International Patient Summary IG</h2><p>The official URL for this implementation guide is: </p><pre>http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/ImplementationGuide/ig-uv-ips</pre></div>
  </text>
  <url value="http://hl7.org/fhir/ips/ImplementationGuide/ig-uv-ips"/>
  <name value="International Patient Summary IG"/>
  <status value="active"/>
  <publisher value="Health Level Seven International"/>
  <fhirVersion value="STU3"/>
  <package id="p1">
    <name value="base"/>
    <resource>
      <extension
                 url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/implementationguide-page">
        <valueUri value="ValueSet-condition-severity-uv-ips.html"/>
      </extension>
      <example value="false"/>
      <sourceReference>
        <reference value="ValueSet/condition-severity-uv-ips"/>
      </sourceReference>
    </resource>
    <resource>
      <extension
                 url="http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/implementationguide-page">
        <valueUri value="StructureDefinition-condition-uv-ips.html"/>
      </extension>
      <example value="false"/>
      <sourceReference>
        <reference value="StructureDefinition/condition-uv-ips"/>
      </sourceReference>
    </resource>
  </package>
  <page>
    <source value="index.md"/>
    <title value="International Patient Summary Home"/>
  </page>
</ImplementationGuide>
